resources.string: በዊንዶውስ የምትጠቀሙበት ዋናውን የላቲን ስክሪፕት የሆነውን የፊደል ገበታ ይምረጡ፣ የኪይማን የፊደል ገበታ ከመረጥከው ንድፍ ጋር ወዲያውኑ ይላመዳል።

resources.string: መደበኛውን አቋራጭ ቁልፍ ይምረጡ ወይም \'Custom\' እና Ctrl, Shift እና Alt ያዝና የፈለግከውን አቋራጭ ቁልፍ ለምትፈልገው ቋንቋ ይክፈቱ %1$s:

string.name: SKUnsafeHotkey
string.comment: Hotkey dialog - warning of hotkey conflict with standard keyboard use

resources.string: የመረጥከው አቋራጭ ቁልፍ %1$s ከመደበኛው የፊደል ገበታ ጋር ይጋጫል፤ ስለዚህ Ctrl ወይም Alt መጠቀም አለብህ። አሁን መቀየር ትፈልጋለህ?

resources.string: የመረጥከው አቋራጭ ቁልፍ %1$s ከመረጥከው የፊደል ገበታ ጋር ይጋጫል %2$s። በዚህ ከቀጠልክ %2$s የዚህ የፊደል ገበታ አቋራጭ ቁልፍ ይሰረዛል፣ ልቀጥል?

string.name: SKHintsReset
string.comment: Hint - options tab dialog confirming reset of hints

resources.string: ሁሉም የፍንጭ መልዕክቶች ዳግም ተጀምረዋል እናም እንደገና ይታያሉ።

string.name: HintTitle_KH_EXITPRODUCT
string.comment: Hint - dialog title upon attempting to exit product

string.name: Hint_KH_EXITPRODUCT
string.comment: Hint - asks for confirmation, explains the difference between de-activating a keyboard layout and closing Product

resources.string: እርግጠኛ ነዎት ኪይማኑን መዝጋት ይፈልጋሉ? የእርስዎ የፊደል ገበታ አሁንም በዊንዶውስ ቋንቋዎች ውስጥ ተዘርዝረዋል ፣ ነገር ግን ኪይማን ዳግም እስኪጀምር ድረስ ተግባራዊ አይሆንም።

string.name: HintTitle_KH_CLOSEOSK
string.comment: Hint - dialog title upon closing the OSK

string.name: Hint_KH_CLOSEOSK
string.comment: Hint - explains that Product is still running and informs how to reopen OSK

resources.string: የስክሪን ላይ የፊደል ገበታ ዘግተዋል። ኪይማኑ አሁንም እየሰራ ነው፤ \"የስክሪን ላይ የፊደል ገበታ\" የሚለውን በመጫን በማንኛውም ጊዜ መክፈት ይችላሉ።

string.name: S_HintDialog_DontShowHintAgain
string.comment: Hint dialog - caption of checkbox at bottom of dialog

string.name: S_HelpTitle
string.comment: Help - product name help

string.name: S_Help_Product
string.comment: Help - help contents link title

string.comment: Help - text preceding keyboard name

string.name: S_Help_Keyboard_Suffix
string.comment: Help - text following keyboard name

string.comment: Toolbar help - View OSK pop-up text

string.comment: Toolbar help - View Character Map pop-up text

string.name: S_Toolbar_OpenConfiguration
string.comment: Toolbar help - Open Keyman Configuration pop-up text

string.name: S_Toolbar_OpenHelp
string.comment: Toolbar help - Open help pop-up text

string.name: S_Toolbar_CloseOnScreenKeyboard
string.comment: Toolbar help - Close OSK pop-up text

string.name: S_Menu_SwitchKeymanOff
string.comment: Systray item - Switch Keyman Off [& precedes alt + access-character]

string.comment: Systray item - OSK [& precedes alt + access-character]

string.comment: Systray item - Help [& precedes alt + access-character]

string.comment: Systray item - Exit [& precedes alt + access-character]

string.name: S_OSKContext_FadeWhenInactive
string.comment: OSK right-click menu - fade OSK when mouse is elsewhere

string.name: S_OSKContext_ShowToolbar
string.comment: OSK right-click menu - show/hide OSK toolbar

string.name: S_OSKContext_SaveAsWebPage
string.comment: OSK right-click menu - save diagram of active keyboard layout as a web page

string.name: S_OSKContext_Print
string.comment: OSK right-click menu - print diagram of active keyboard layout

string.name: SKApplicationTitle
string.comment: Product name used for the title of message boxes and message dialogs

string.name: SKSplashVersion
string.comment: Version number

string.name: SKButtonPrint
string.comment: Print button in Welcome dialog for keyboards

string.name: SKPackageAlreadyInstalled
string.comment: Notice during package installation that a package with the same name is already installed.

resources.string: %1$s የሚል ስም ያለው ጥቅል አስቀድሞ ተጭኗል። እሱን ማጥፋትና አዲሱን መጫን ይፈልጋሉ?

string.name: SKKeyboardAlreadyInstalled
string.comment: Notice during keyboard layout installation that a keyboard layout with the same name is already installed.

resources.string: የፊደል ገበታ \'%1$s \' የሚባል አስቀድሞ ተጭኗል፤ አዲሱ ከመጫኑ በፊት የቀድሞውን ያጠፋብዎታል፤ በዚሁ ይቀጥላሉ?

string.name: SKKeyboardPartOfPackage
string.comment: Notice of need to uninstall an entire package

resources.string: የቁልፍ ሰሌዳው \'%1$s\' የጥቅል \'%2$s\' አካል ነው፤ ሙሉ ጥቅሉን ማጥፋት አለብዎት፤ ይቀጥላሉ?

string.name: SKInstallLanguageTransientLimit
string.comment: Message shown when Keyman is unable to install a Windows language for a keyboard

resources.string: የቁልፍ ሰሌዳ ቋንቋ መጫን አልተቻለም፤ ምክንያቱም ዊንዶውስ የአራት ጊዜ ጊዜያዊ ቋንቋዎች ወሰን አለው፤ እና እርስዎ እዚህ ገደብ ላይ ደርሰው ይሆናል።

string.name: SKPackageDoesNotIncludeWelcome
string.comment: Notice of lack of introductory help

resources.string: ጥቅሉ ወይም የቋንቋው ሰሌዳ \'%1$s\' ምንም የመግቢያ እርዳታ አላካተተም።

string.name: SKOSNotSupported
string.comment: Notice of unsupported operating system

string.name: SKOnlineHelpFile
string.comment: File name of the help file - must be .chm format. The locale folder will be checked first for the file

string.name: SKCouldNotFindHelp
string.comment: Notice of help file not found

string.name: SKANSIEncoding
string.comment: Keyboard with an ANSI or Codepage encoding

string.name: SKUnicodeEncoding
string.comment: Keyboard with a Unicode encoding

string.name: SKDownloadProgress_Title
string.comment: Notice of file downloading

string.name: SKUninstallOnScreenKeyboard
string.comment: Request for confirmation to uninstall OSK for a keyboard layout

resources.string: የተጫነውን የስክሪን ላይ ኪቦርዱን ማስወገድ ይፈልጋሉ %1$s?

string.name: SKUninstallKeyboard
string.comment: Request for confirmation to uninstall keyboard layout

string.name: SKUninstallPackage
string.comment: Request for confirmation to uninstall a package

string.name: SKUninstallPackageFonts
string.comment: Text embedded in SKUninstallPackage when fonts are ready for uninstall.

string.name: SKUnicodeData_Build
string.comment: Request to build Unicode Character Map database

resources.string: የቃላት ማፕ ስራ ላይ ከመዋሉ በፊት መገንባት ያስፈልገዋል፤ አሁን ይገንባ?

string.name: SKUnicodeData_DatabaseCouldNotBeDeleted
string.comment: Error deleting Unicode Character Map database

resources.string: የዩኒኮድ ቃላት ዳታቤዝ እንደገና ለመገንባት ሊጠፋ አልቻለም፤ የገጠመው ችግር ዝርዝር፦ %1$s

string.name: SKUnicodeData_CouldNotCreateDatabase
string.comment: Error creating Unicode Character Map database

resources.string: የዩኒኮድ ቃላት ዳታቤዝ ሊፈጠር አልቻለም እና ተሰናክሏል፤ የገጠመው ችግር ዝርዝር፦ %1$s

string.name: SKUnicodeData_DatabaseLoadFailedRebuild
string.comment: Error loading Unicode Character Map database. Request to rebuild.

resources.string: የዩኒኮድ ቃላት ዳታቤዝ በጥሩ ሁኔታ ሊጫን አልቻለም (%1$s )፤ እንደገና አሁን ይገንባ?

string.name: SKCannotStartProduct
string.comment: Error from Keyman failing to start keyman.exe due to an access denied or file not found

resources.string:
ኪይማን መነሳት አልቻለም፤ ከመቀጠልዎ በፊት የፕሮግራሙ ሴኪዩሪቲ ሴቲንግ keyman.exe እንዲጀመር የተፈቀደ መሆኑን ለማረጋገጥ እባክዎ የደህንነት ቅንብሮችዎን ይፈትሹ። የተመለሰው ስህተት 

"%1$s"

አሁን ኪይማን እንደገና ለማስጀመር መሞከር ይፈልጋሉ?

string.name: SKDebuggingWarning
string.comment: Warning upon starting debugging in the Options tab

resources.string:
ኪይማን ማረሚያ መረጃ %LOCALAPPDATA%\Keyman\Diag\system#.etl (# ቁጥር ባለበት) ተብሎ በሚጠራው መዝገብ ውስጥ ይቀመጣል። ይህንን ፋይል ለመሰረዝ ከመሞከርዎ በፊት ከኪማን መውጣት አለብዎት። 

ማስጠንቀቂያ: ይህ ፋይል በፍጥነት ሊያድግ ይችላል። ኢኔብሊንግ ዲበጊንግ (enabling debugging) ሲስተምዎን ሊያዘገይ ይችላል እና መደረግ ያለበት በቴክኒክ ድጋፍ ብቻ ከሆነ ነው። 

የግል ማስጠንቀቂያ: እባክዎን ዲበጊንግ ሎግ ፋይል ሪከርድስ (debug logfile records) ሁሉንም የሚተይቡትን ቁልፍ ጭነቶች ይመዘግባል። ዲበጊንግ ሎግ (debug log) ማስታወሻውን ለምርመራ ወይም ለምርመራ ክፍለ ጊዜ ብቻ ማብራት አለብዎት።

string.name: S_OSK_FontHelper_PleaseWait
string.comment: OSK Font helper message

resources.string: ለፊደል ገበታው የሚሆን ተዛማጅ የፊደል ቅርጽ ለመፈለግ እባክዎ ይጠብቁ %1$s

string.name: S_OSK_FontHelper_NonUnicode
string.comment: OSK Font helper non-Unicode keyboard

resources.string: የፊደል ገበታ %1$s የዩኒኮድ ቁልፍ ሰሌዳ አይደለም፤ የፊደል ቅርጽ በራሱ ስር ሊገኙ አልቻለም፤ ለፊደል ቅርጹ መረጃ እባክዎን የቁልፍ ሰሌዳ ሰነዱን ያረጋግጡ።

string.name: S_OSK_FontHelper_NoKeyboards
string.comment: OSK Font helper no keyboards

resources.string: በአሁኑ ጊዜ ምንም የቁልፍ ሰሌዳ አቀማመጥ አልተጫነም አልተጫነም።

string.name: S_OSK_FontHelper_ChooseKeyboard
string.comment: OSK Font helper choose keyboard

resources.string: ተዛማጅ የፊደላት ቅርጽ ለማግኘት እባክዎ የኪይማኑን የፊደል ሰሌዳ ይምረጡ።

string.name: SKTextEditorCaption
string.comment: Caption of Text Editor
